$env:PYTHONPATH="E:\dev\github\Fluidity1337\ai-ml-predictive-models\src"

1) wRC+ Fangraphs, grab manually Advanced, Team, Split, wRC+
https://www.fangraphs.com/leaders/splits-leaderboards?splitArr=44&splitArrPitch=&autoPt=false&splitTeams=false&statType=team&statgroup=2&startDate=2025-03-01&endDate=2025-11-01&players=&filter=&groupBy=season&wxTemperature=&wxPressure=&wxAirDensity=&wxElevation=&wxWindSpeed=&position=B&sort=23,1

2) wOBA - advanced_team_stats.py - refresh
python advanced_team_stats.py --force --quiet
  or
python -m utils.mlb.advanced_team_stats --force

3) python -m src.pipelines.run_mlb_rfi_pipeline 2025-07-22
  or
python -m pipelines.run_mlb_rfi_pipeline 2025-07-22

python src/utils/mlb/augment_game_summaries.py -i data/baseball/mlb/raw -o data/baseball/mlb/interim/game_summaries
python src/models/sports/baseball/mlb/calibrate_nrfi_scores.py -i data/baseball/mlb/interim/game_summaries -p "mlb_daily_game_summary_*_augmented.json" -d data/baseball/mlb/processed/game_summaries

python src/renderers/build_rfi_websheet.py

^\s*\+

BUILD
------
pip install -e .
e.g. from mlb_rfi.fangraphs_client import FangraphsClient


TESTING
---------
UNIT TESTS
pytest -v -m "not integration"
JUST INTEGRATIONS
pytest -v -m integration --run-integration
EVERYTHING
pytest -v --run-integration 


cd F:\Dropbox\1_Work\Development\GitHub\Fluidity1337\ai-ml-predictive-models
pytest -v tests/test_fangraphs_client.py

To support both unit (mocked) tests and live (integration) tests hitting the real FanGraphs API, you can:

Mark your live tests with @pytest.mark.integration

Skip them by default in a conftest.py (as shown earlier)

Have them dynamically skip if the host can’t be resolved

Run them on demand with pytest -v --run-integration


python -m src.models.sports.baseball.mlb.data_sources.api.fetch_mlb_probable_starting_pitchers

python launch_probable_pitchers.py

rmdir /s /q .venv
python -m venv .venv
.\.venv\Scripts\activate
python -m pip install --upgrade pip
pip install pandas

pip install pandas requests
